long_description: Looking for a sleek, secure and, most importantly, affordable fork-mounted bike carrying machine? Look no further than the Thule Prologue Fork Mount bike rack. Secure locking skewer and intuitive-grasp clamping lever fits all disc/suspension combinations with standard 9mm axles and it's approved for carbon forks as well. Mounts easily to Yakima round bars and Thule square bars. Wheel trays fit tire widths up to 2.6 in. with high-profile rims; carries bikes with wheelbase up to 48 in. Thule One Key System (sold separately) locks bike to carrier. Carries 1 bike. Xadapt9 required when used with Thule Aero bars.
short_description: Looking for a sleek, secure and, most importantly, affordable fork-mounted bike carrying machine? Look no further than the Thule Prologue Fork Mount bike rack.
